channel.title: Free open source Autotyper/Autoclicker
channel.description:
I whipped these up in a few minutes to compete with the Administrator at Sythe selling a very simple auto clicker for $2.99USD.
They're made in Autohotkey, a very simple scripting language :rolleyes:
[b][size=12pt]AutoClicker[/size][/b]
AutoHotKey is available for free here: [url=http://www.autohotkey.com/download/]http://www.autohotkey.com/download/[/url]
Alternatively, you can download the pre-compiled .exe here: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?7a008nzcvp3kjz5]http://www.mediafire.com/?7a008nzcvp3kjz5[/url]
This AutoClicker features random pixel offset and random intervals based on your input.
[code];Anyone can use this, just don't sell it please. If you decide to share, please give credit where credit is due ;Autoclicker by TaylorV@villavu
InputBox, time, Wait time, How long to wait between clicks? (random time will be added),,220,150,,,,,1200 InputBox, random, Random, Random interval to add/subtract from your time(will choose a number between 0 and your input here to add/subtract from your original time),,450,150,,,,,100 MsgBox,`nF1 - Start`nF2 - Restart`nF3 - Exit
F1::Start() F2::Reload F3::ExitApp
Start() { Global SplashTextOn, 145, 60, Clicks, Clicking once every %time% ms WinMove, Clicks, , 0, 0 Loop { MouseGetPos, x, y Random, rx, -5, 5 Random, ry, -5, 5 MouseClick, left, x+rx, y+ry MouseMove, x, y Random, rt, -random, random Sleep, time+rt } }
[/code]
[b]_____________________________________________________________[/b]
[size=12pt][b]AutoTyper[/b][/size]
AutoHotKey is available for download here: [url=http://www.autohotkey.com/download/]http://www.autohotkey.com/download/[/url]
Alternatively, you can download the pre-compiled .exe which can be found here: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?5qbpw000iqxcs90]http://www.mediafire.com/?5qbpw000iqxcs90[/url]
This will type out exactly what you enter in the input box, followed by pressing Enter("Send, {Enter}")
[code];Free AutoTyper by TaylorV at Villavu ;Feel free to share but please leave credits
InputBox, x, AutoType, What do you want to say?`n`nMade by TaylorV at Villavu
F1::Start() ;Types once F2::Reload ;Restarts script
Start() { Global Sendraw, %x% Send, {Enter} }[/code]
_____________________________________________
Basically copypasta from my post on Sythe. Enjoy

item.title: Free open source Autotyper/Autoclicker
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

I whipped these up in a few minutes to compete with the Administrator at Sythe selling a very simple auto clicker for $2.99USD.

They’re made in Autohotkey, a very simple scripting language :rolleyes:

[size=12pt]AutoClicker[/size]

AutoHotKey is available for free here: http://www.autohotkey.com/download/

Alternatively, you can download the pre-compiled .exe here: http://www.mediafire.com/?7a008nzcvp3kjz5

This AutoClicker features random pixel offset and random intervals based on your input.

[code];Anyone can use this, just don’t sell it please. If you decide to share, please give credit where credit is due
;Autoclicker by TaylorV@villavu

InputBox, time, Wait time, How long to wait between clicks? (random time will be added),220,150,1200
InputBox, random, Random, Random interval to add/subtract from your time(will choose a number between 0 and your input here to add/subtract from your original time),450,150,100
MsgBox,nF1 - StartnF2 - Restart`nF3 - Exit

F1::Start()
F2::Reload
F3::ExitApp

Start()
{
Global
SplashTextOn, 145, 60, Clicks, Clicking once every %time% ms
WinMove, Clicks, , 0, 0
Loop
{
MouseGetPos, x, y
Random, rx, -5, 5
Random, ry, -5, 5
MouseClick, left, x+rx, y+ry
MouseMove, x, y
Random, rt, -random, random
Sleep, time+rt
}
}

[/code]

_____________________________________________________________

[size=12pt]AutoTyper[/size]

AutoHotKey is available for download here: http://www.autohotkey.com/download/

Alternatively, you can download the pre-compiled .exe which can be found here: http://www.mediafire.com/?5qbpw000iqxcs90

This will type out exactly what you enter in the input box, followed by pressing Enter(“Send, {Enter}”)

[code];Free AutoTyper by TaylorV at Villavu
;Feel free to share but please leave credits

InputBox, x, AutoType, What do you want to say?nnMade by TaylorV at Villavu

F1::Start() ;Types once
F2::Reload ;Restarts script

Start()
{
Global
Sendraw, %x%
Send, {Enter}
}[/code]

Basically copypasta from my post on Sythe. Enjoy
